conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: walls are extruded with thickness, multiple faces per element are visible, and the camera is in an elevated angled/isometric-like view with the ceiling removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable room volumes; clean cutaway. Minor simplification of some junction details/trim and slightly uniform wall top treatment.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacency match (open kitchen/dining + living left; two bedrooms right; bathroom center-right; hall and laundry/closets lower-left). Some minor deviations in exact partition lengths/door positioning and a few opening proportions compared to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures present (beds, sofa/living seating, dining table, kitchen counters/island, laundry appliances, bathroom fixtures). A few items are simplified blocks and some placements are approximate rather than exact to the plan symbols.

visual_clarity.notes: Good readability with consistent materials and lighting; geometry is mostly clean. Slightly low contrast between some floor/wall surfaces and limited detail on openings reduces precision checking.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window opening sizes and exact placements appear slightly adjusted/simplified relative to the 2D plan.
Minor layout proportional differences in a few internal partitions/closet boundaries versus the 2D drawing, though overall configuration remains faithful.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity and furnishings, with only minor proportional and opening-placement deviations from the 2D plan.
